questions: Is there an image of a character whose aura is being graded? Answer with yes or no.
Is the image cropped to the size of a real card? Answer with yes or no.
Does the label at the top have the title 'GNRLYXYZ'? Answer with yes or no.
Is '1/1' displayed directly below 'GNRLYXYZ' on the label? Answer with yes or no.
Is there a barcode placed beneath the '1/1'? Answer with yes or no.
Is the grade label displayed on the right side of the label at the top? Answer with yes or no.
Is the numeric grade from the scale displayed below the grade label? Answer with yes or no.
Is the certification number displayed below the numeric grade? Answer with yes or no.
Is all text on the label uniform in size? Answer with yes or no.
Is there balanced padding from the border for all text on the label? Answer with yes or no.
Is the display placed on a white background? Answer with yes or no.
Is the full display shown without any text or labels on the card? Answer with yes or no.
model_output:
no The image contains a character card but there's no visible indication that an aura is being graded.
no The image is not cropped to the size of a real card; it includes a decorative border around the card.
yes The label at the top of the card does have the title 'GNRLYXYZ'.
no '1/1' is not displayed directly below 'GNRLYXYZ'; instead, there is "GEMT" and又一次气泡显示数字“1”。
no There is no barcode placed beneath '1/1'; the barcode is located near the bottom left part of the card.
no There is no grade label displayed on the right side of the label at the top.
no There is no numeric grade from the scale displayed below the grade label due to the absence of a grade label.
no Since there is no grade label, there is also no certification number displayed below where such a label would be expected.
no The text on the label varies in size, as seen with the title 'GNRLYXYZ' being larger than other texts.
no The padding from the border is not balanced for all text on the label; some elements like 'GNRLYXYZ' are closer to the edge than others.
yes The display is placed on a white background, which can be seen around the purple and black border.
no The full display is not shown without any text or labels on the card; there are multiple texts and labels present.
